::Firearm::

Firearm frowns, reading the reports of the computer. He'd have to 
find a way to disarm the chip... He sighs. He was a warrior, not a 
doctor!

Walking over to a machine, he slides it across the floor, coming up 
to near Spears. He hoocks up a box-like object with an opening up to 
Spears's chest, turning it on. The machine was designed to remove her 
spark, and put it in a containment field while he worked on her body, 
in case something went wrong. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> Computer scan:
> Chip is linked into thought proceeses and motor control. 
> Also linked to autodestruct mechanism inside of bot.
> Removal may result in self destruct sequence.  
> Must disarm chip before removal.
